Vanilla <td>'s replace Bulletproof Buttons

Bulletproof Buttons (button.cm) have click and tracking issues with
Outlook. I replaced them with <td>'s with background colors. Buttons
degrade gracefully, as some clients don‚Äôt support border-radius or
background images, though the anchor text and background color display
universally.
Merge branch 'master' into gh-pages
Merge branch 'gh-pages'

Style iOS blue links

Attempts to style default blue links for phone #‚Äôs in iOS. Seems to
work in Mail 7.1, spotty support in other clients like Gmail and
Mailbox.

Litmus [lists other
methods](https://litmus.com/blog/update-banning-blue-links-on-ios-device
s) to style or disable blue links in iOS devices, I believe *styling*
links is better practice then *disabling* them for aesthetic reasons.
Merge branch 'master' into gh-pages

Removed disable auto telephone linking in iOS

Don‚Äôt want to outright disable this behavior to save a visual. Best to
wrap offending links in a styled <span>
https://litmus.com/blog/update-banning-blue-links-on-ios-devices
Merge branch 'master' into gh-pages

Updated <title>

<title> tag shows on email notifications on Android 4.4. before
pre-header. It shows: Subject, Title, Preheader. Probably best to put
something safe (like the brand name) or nothing at all.
https://twitter.com/iamacyborg/status/455681065202749440
Merge branch 'gh-pages'

Removed Imageless Buttons

The imageless button is a hack involving improperly nested markup to
achieve a decent button. Mail Chimp trips over this part of the
template and breaks the entire layout.

This update replaces the imageless button hack with Campaign Monitor‚Äôs
bulletproof email buttons.
